data.actual_result: The information is much too close to the line separator
data.expected_result: There should be more spacing between the information and the line separator
data.short_description: Invite information (Inviter, Invite Code, Uses, Expires) in Server Settings is too close to the line separator
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server that you have Manage Server & Invite Creation permission in - Create an invite - Go into the server's Server Settings -> Invites - Observe the information at the top under the line separator
